{}.response: The 'All Countries' API provides current fuel prices for all European countries. This comprehensive resource gathers data from the European Commission’s database, offering an updated list of average petrol and diesel prices across Europe. Users can rely on this information for various purposes, including economic analysis, travel planning, and budgeting for transportation costs. The fuel prices are typically reported in the local currency of each country and may also be available in Euros for a standardized comparison. This API is an invaluable tool for individuals and businesses alike, ensuring access to the latest fuel cost trends within the European market. To use this API, simply make a request without any input parameters, and it will return a list of countries accompanied by their respective fuel prices. Please note that prices are subject to change based on international crude oil markets and local taxation policies. Regular updates reflect these changes, providing users with the most current information available.
